plot: Julia takes over as leader of Chester's Mill after the town becomes divided in the wake of Big Jim and Rebecca's plans for population control. Meanwhile, Joe and Norrie continue to help Melanie search for more clues about her identity.

With Big Jim and Rebecca in jail, townsfolk begin to take sides leading to violence and a death. Julia urges everyone to voluntarily combine their food supplies - something many will not do - but it all backfires when the food storage facility at the fire station is blown up. It looks like sabotage and in the end Julia - who has reconciled with Barbie - realizes there is only one way to ease the tension. Elsewhere, Joe, Norrie and Melanie set off to learn more about Melanie's return to Chester's Mill but emotions get in the way. Sam Verdreaux meanwhile returns home to find his house ransacked and Junior looking for any information about his mother. Junior has decided that the absent Lyle has to be responsible for Angie's death and Sam agrees to help find him.—garykmcd
